title: A briefe and yet exact and accurate description of the present state of the great & mighty empire of Germany both touching the formes of their civil government and profession in religion / taken by a diligent and faithfull surveyor of it, with much paines travelled over that whole country to informe himself and others of these things ; now published by Sa. Clarke ... for the publick good.
author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.
publisher: Printed by A.M. for William Miller ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
